00036 static const TraceClass TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES("IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES", "IO device instance management");
00037 static const TraceClass TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING("IO_DEVICE_OPENING", "IO device opening management");
00038 
00039 
00040 OutputDevice::OutputDevice(
00041         const std::string& STR_DbgName,
00042         const std::string& STR_Endl,
00043         const bool B_AutoDelete)
00044   : m_strDbgName(STR_DbgName),
00045     m_strEndl(STR_Endl),
00046     m_iInstanceLock(B_AutoDelete ? 0 : 1), m_iOpenLock(0)
00047 {
00048     // Please, no traces in constructor for consistency reasons.
00049 }
00050 
00051 OutputDevice::~OutputDevice(void)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 const int OutputDevice::UseInstance(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00056 {
00057     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00058         << "One more user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00059         << "user count: " << m_iInstanceLock << " -> " << m_iInstanceLock + 1 << ", "
00060         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00061         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00062     m_iInstanceLock ++;
00063     return m_iInstanceLock;
00064 }
00065 
00066 const int OutputDevice::FreeInstance(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00067 {
00068     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00069         << "One less user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00070         << "user count: " << m_iInstanceLock << " -> " << m_iInstanceLock - 1 << ", "
00071         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00072         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00073     if (m_iInstanceLock == 1)
00074     {
00075         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_INSTANCES)
00076             << "Deleting the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00077         delete this;
00078         return 0;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         m_iInstanceLock --;
00083         assert(m_iInstanceLock > 0);
00084         return m_iInstanceLock;
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 const int OutputDevice::GetInstanceUsers(void) const
00089 {
00090     return m_iInstanceLock;
00091 }
00092 
00093 const bool OutputDevice::OpenUp(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00094 {
00095     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00096         << "One more user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00097         << "user count: " << m_iOpenLock << " -> " << m_iOpenLock + 1 << ", "
00098         << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00099         << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00100 
00101     m_iOpenLock ++;
00102 
00103     if (m_iOpenLock == 1)
00104     {
00105         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00106             << "Opening the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00107         if (! OpenDevice())
00108         {
00109             return false;
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113     return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 const bool OutputDevice::CloseDown(const CallInfo& CLI_CallInfo)
00117 {
00118     bool b_Res = true;
00119 
00120     if (m_iOpenLock > 0)
00121     {
00122         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00123             << "One less user for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00124             << "user count: " << m_iOpenLock << " -> " << m_iOpenLock - 1 << ", "
00125             << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00126             << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00127 
00128         if (m_iOpenLock == 1)
00129         {
00130             GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00131                 << "Closing the device " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << endl;
00132             b_Res = CloseDevice();
00133         }
00134 
00135         m_iOpenLock --;
00136     }
00137     else
00138     {
00139         GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_IO_DEVICE_OPENING)
00140             << "No more closing down for instance " << m_strDbgName << "/" << this << ", "
00141             << "user count = " << m_iOpenLock << ", "
00142             << "from " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFunction() << " "
00143             << "at " << CLI_CallInfo.GetFile() << ":" << CLI_CallInfo.GetLine() << endl;
00144     }
00145 
00146     return b_Res;
00147 }
00148 
00149 const int OutputDevice::GetOpenUsers(void) const
00150 {
00151     return m_iOpenLock;
00152 }

00155 {

00157     return *this;

00160 const OutputDevice& OutputDevice::operator <<(const char* const STR_Out) const
00161 {
00162     if (STR_Out != NULL)
00163     {
00164         PutString(STR_Out);
00165     }
00166     return *this;
00167 }

00200 const OutputDevice& OutputDevice::operator <<(const int I_Out) const
00201 {
00202     char str_Out[128];
00203     snprintf(str_Out, sizeof(str_Out), "%d", I_Out);
00204     PutString(str_Out);
00205     return *this;
00206 }

00230 {

00233     PutString(str_Out);
00234     return *this;

00243 OutputDevice& OutputDevice::GetNullDevice(void)
00244 {
00245     class NullDevice : public OutputDevice
00246     {
00247     public:
00248         NullDevice(void) : OutputDevice("null", "", false) {}
00249         virtual ~NullDevice(void) {}
00250 
00251     protected:
00252         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00253         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00254     public:
00255         virtual void PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const {}
00256         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00257     };
00258 
00259     static NullDevice cli_Null;
00260     return cli_Null;
00261 }

00263 OutputDevice& OutputDevice::GetStdOut(void)
00264 {
00265     class StdOutDevice : public OutputDevice
00266     {
00267     public:
00268         StdOutDevice(void) : OutputDevice("stdout", "\n", false) {}
00269         virtual ~StdOutDevice(void) {}
00270 
00271     protected:
00272         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00273         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00274     public:
00275         virtual void PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const { std::cout << STR_Out; }
00276         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00277     };
00278 
00279     static StdOutDevice cli_StdOut;
00280     return cli_StdOut;
00281 }

00286     {
00287     public:
00288         StdErrDevice(void) : OutputDevice("stderr", "\n", false) {}
00289         virtual ~StdErrDevice(void) {}
00290 
00291     protected:
00292         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00293         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00294     public:
00295         virtual void PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const { std::cerr << STR_Out; }
00296         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00297     };
00298 
00299     static StdErrDevice cli_StdErr;
00300     return cli_StdErr;

00316 IODevice& IODevice::GetNullDevice(void)
00317 {
00318     class NullDevice : public IODevice
00319     {
00320     public:
00321         NullDevice(void) : IODevice("null", "", false) {}
00322         virtual ~NullDevice(void) {}
00323 
00324     protected:
00325         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) { return true; }
00326         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) { return true; }
00327     public:
00328         virtual void PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const {}
00329         virtual void Beep(void) const {}
00330         virtual const KEY GetKey(void) const { return NULL_KEY; }
00331     };
00332 
00333     static NullDevice cli_Null;
00334     return cli_Null;
00335 }
00336 
00337 IODevice& IODevice::GetStdIn(void)
00338 {
00339     class StdInDevice : public IODevice
00340     {
00341     public:
00342         StdInDevice(void) : IODevice("stdin", "", false) {
00343         }
00344         virtual ~StdInDevice(void) {
00345         }
00346 
00347     protected:
00348         virtual const bool OpenDevice(void) {
00349             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00350             return OutputDevice::GetStdOut().OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__);
00351         }
00352         virtual const bool CloseDevice(void) {
00353             bool b_Res = OutputDevice::GetStdOut().CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__);
00354             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00355             return b_Res;
00356         }
00357     public:
00358         virtual void PutString(const std::string& STR_Out) const {
00359             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().PutString(STR_Out);
00360         }
00361         virtual void Beep(void) const {
00362             OutputDevice::GetStdOut().Beep();
00363         }
00364         virtual const KEY GetKey(void) const {
00365             if (! m_strInput.empty())
00366             {
00367                 const char c_Char = m_strInput[0];
00368                 m_strInput.erase(m_strInput.begin());
00369                 return IODevice::GetKey(c_Char);
00370             }
00371             else
00372             {
00373                 std::cin >> m_strInput;
00374                 m_strInput += "\n";
00375                 return StdInDevice::GetKey();
00376             }
00377         }
00378 
00379     private:
00380         mutable std::string m_strInput;
00381     };
00382 
00383     static StdInDevice cli_StdIn;
00384     return cli_StdIn;
00385 }
00386 
00387 const KEY IODevice::GetKey(const int I_Char) const
00388 {
00389     switch (I_Char)
00390     {
00391     case 3:             return BREAK;
00392     case 4:             return LOGOUT;
00393     case 10: case 13:   return ENTER;
00394     case 27:            return ESCAPE;
00395     case 127:           return BACKSPACE;
00396     case 1001:          return KEY_UP;
00397     case 1002:          return KEY_DOWN;
00398     case 1005:          return PAGE_UP;
00399     case 1006:          return PAGE_DOWN;
00400 
00401     case ' ':           return SPACE;
00402     case '\t':          return TAB;
00403 
00404     case '0':   return KEY_0;
00405     case '1':   return KEY_1;
00406     case '2':   return KEY_2;
00407     case '3':   return KEY_3;
00408     case '4':   return KEY_4;
00409     case '5':   return KEY_5;
00410     case '6':   return KEY_6;
00411     case '7':   return KEY_7;
00412     case '8':   return KEY_8;
00413     case '9':   return KEY_9;
00414 
00415     case 'a':   return KEY_a;
00416     case 'b':   return KEY_b;
00417     case 'c':   return KEY_c;
00418     case 'd':   return KEY_d;
00419     case 'e':   return KEY_e;
00420     case 'f':   return KEY_f;
00421     case 'g':   return KEY_g;
00422     case 'h':   return KEY_h;
00423     case 'i':   return KEY_i;
00424     case 'j':   return KEY_j;
00425     case 'k':   return KEY_k;
00426     case 'l':   return KEY_l;
00427     case 'm':   return KEY_m;
00428     case 'n':   return KEY_n;
00429     case 'o':   return KEY_o;
00430     case 'p':   return KEY_p;
00431     case 'q':   return KEY_q;
00432     case 'r':   return KEY_r;
00433     case 's':   return KEY_s;
00434     case 't':   return KEY_t;
00435     case 'u':   return KEY_u;
00436     case 'v':   return KEY_v;
00437     case 'w':   return KEY_w;
00438     case 'x':   return KEY_x;
00439     case 'y':   return KEY_y;
00440     case 'z':   return KEY_z;
00441 
00442     case 'A':   return KEY_A;
00443     case 'B':   return KEY_B;
00444     case 'C':   return KEY_C;
00445     case 'D':   return KEY_D;
00446     case 'E':   return KEY_E;
00447     case 'F':   return KEY_F;
00448     case 'G':   return KEY_G;
00449     case 'H':   return KEY_H;
00450     case 'I':   return KEY_I;
00451     case 'J':   return KEY_J;
00452     case 'K':   return KEY_K;
00453     case 'L':   return KEY_L;
00454     case 'M':   return KEY_M;
00455     case 'N':   return KEY_N;
00456     case 'O':   return KEY_O;
00457     case 'P':   return KEY_P;
00458     case 'Q':   return KEY_Q;
00459     case 'R':   return KEY_R;
00460     case 'S':   return KEY_S;
00461     case 'T':   return KEY_T;
00462     case 'U':   return KEY_U;
00463     case 'V':   return KEY_V;
00464     case 'W':   return KEY_W;
00465     case 'X':   return KEY_X;
00466     case 'Y':   return KEY_Y;
00467     case 'Z':   return KEY_Z;
00468 
00469     case '+':   return PLUS;
00470     case '-':   return MINUS;
00471     case '*':   return STAR;
00472     case '/':   return SLASH;
00473     case '<':   return LOWER_THAN;
00474     case '>':   return GREATER_THAN;
00475     case '=':   return EQUAL;
00476     case '%':   return PERCENT;
00477 
00478     case '_':   return UNDERSCORE;
00479     case '@':   return AROBASE;
00480     case '#':   return SHARP;
00481     case '&':   return AMPERCENT;
00482     case '$':   return DOLLAR;
00483     case '\\':  return BACKSLASH;
00484     case '|':   return PIPE;
00485 
00486     case '?':   return QUESTION;
00487     case '!':   return EXCLAMATION;
00488     case ':':   return COLUMN;
00489     case '.':   return DOT;
00490     case ',':   return COMA;
00491     case ';':   return SEMI_COLUMN;
00492     case '\'':  return QUOTE;
00493     case '"':   return DOUBLE_QUOTE;
00494 
00495     case '(':   return OPENING_BRACE;
00496     case ')':   return CLOSING_BRACE;
00497     case '{':   return OPENING_CURLY_BRACE;
00498     case '}':   return CLOSING_CURLY_BRACE;
00499     case '[':   return OPENING_BRACKET;
00500     case ']':   return CLOSING_BRACKET;
00501 
00502     default:
00503         // Unrecognized character.
00504         return NULL_KEY;
00505     }
